mapper.sql: pid, pname, comname, comper, emp_fk1, empcount, starttime, buildtime, cost, level, endtime, remark, emp_fk
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from project
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into project (pid, pname, comname, comper, emp_fk1, empcount, starttime, buildtime, cost, level, endtime, remark, emp_fk) values (#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comname,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empFk1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{buildtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empFk,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update project
pid = #{record.pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pname = #{record.pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comname = #{record.comname,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comper = #{record.comper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_fk1 = #{record.empFk1,jdbcType=INTEGER},

endtime = #{record.endtime,jdbcType=DATE},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_fk = #{record.empFk,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update project set pid = #{record.pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pname = #{record.pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comname = #{record.comname,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comper = #{record.comper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_fk1 = #{record.empFk1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, empcount = #{record.empcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, starttime = #{record.starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, buildtime = #{record.buildtime,jdbcType=DATE}, cost = #{record.cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{record.level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endtime = #{record.endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_fk = #{record.empFk,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update project
pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comname = #{comname,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comper = #{comper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_fk1 = #{empFk1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
empcount = #{empcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE},
buildtime = #{buildtime,jdbcType=DATE},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_fk = #{empFk,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update project set pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comname = #{comname,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comper = #{comper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_fk1 = #{empFk1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, empcount = #{empcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, buildtime = #{buildtime,jdbcType=DATE}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_fk = #{empFk,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT p.`pid`,p.`pname`,c.`comname`,c.`companyperson`,ename,p.`empcount`,p.`starttime`,p.`buildtime`,p.`endtime`,p.`remark` FROM project p LEFT JOIN customer c ON p.`comname` = c.`id` LEFT JOIN employee e ON p.`emp_fk` = e.`eid`

SELECT * FROM (SELECT p.level ,p.`comname` cname ,e.`eid`,p.`cost`,p.`pid`,p.`pname`,c.`comname`,c.`companyperson`,ename,p.`empcount`,p.`starttime`,p.`buildtime`,p.`endtime`,p.`remark` FROM project p LEFT JOIN customer c ON p.`comname` = c.`id` LEFT JOIN employee e ON p.`emp_fk` = e.`eid` ) tmp WHERE tmp.pid=#{pid}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.`pid`,p.`pname`,c.`comname`,c.`companyperson`,ename,p.`empcount`,p.`starttime`,p.`buildtime`,p.`endtime`,p.`remark` FROM project p LEFT JOIN customer c ON p.`comname` = c.`id` LEFT JOIN employee e ON p.`emp_fk` = e.`eid`) tmp WHERE
pname like concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') or ename like concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%')
pname like concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%')
ename like concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%')
order by buildtime
order by endtime
SELECT pid,pname FROM project WHERE pid NOT IN ( SELECT id FROM analysis )
